name: Amazement Precious Park
text: You can activate 1 "?ttraction" Trap Card during your Main Phase of the turn it is Set. During the End Phase: You can send 1 of your "?ttraction" Traps equipped to a monster to the GY, then target 1 of your "?ttraction" Traps with a different name that is banished or in your GY; Set it to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of "Amazement Precious Park" once per turn.
